body_html:
Yes, we can change that to a python error. cancan101, does that solve your problem?

The underlying issue is that we don't have fast CPU conv implementation of NCHW format. This is an area that is contribution-welcome.

body:
Yes, we can change that to a python error. cancan101, does that solve your problem? 

The underlying issue is that we don't have fast CPU conv implementation of NCHW format. This is an area that is contribution-welcome.
